entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Prince Albert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -30.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Albert Airport 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -30.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -33.5°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023
